item.title: U.S. moves to mitigate release of Social Security numbers in JFK files
item.description: The White House rushes to mitigate the errant release of more than 400 Social Security numbers and other private information in JFK files.

item.title: Trump signs order aimed at increasing domestic production of critical minerals
Trump signs executive order to dismantle Education Department
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s return to the White House and the new Congress.

item.title: Judge temporarily blocks DOGE from accessing sensitive Social Security data

item.title: Education Secretary says she will work with Congress to eliminate the agency
